    • awakeableHandle

      Client.AwakeableHandle awakeableHandle(String id)
      Create a new Client.AwakeableHandle for the provided identifier. You can use it to Client.AwakeableHandle.resolve(Serde, Object) or Client.AwakeableHandle.reject(String) an Awakeable from the ingress.
